profile:
Welcome to Ashlu Creek Glass Co.
Ashlu Creek Glass Co. began with a vision. Can you offer excellent quality, craftsmanship with pride at a fair price? After seeing many companies in the glazing industry tell customers they can do this but won't do that, add restrictions to each design, overcharge for simple things that should be included in the price; Ashlu Creek Glass Co. was born. Ashlu Creek Glass Co. is determined to have the best customer service, a high quality product, all at a fair price. 

About the Owner
Ashlu Creek Glass Co. is owned and operated by Joshua Sellmann. He brings over 10 years of experience in residential glazing.  Joshua has had the privilege of working in three different cities in Canada: Metro Vancouver, Calgary and the Greater Toronto Area. Therefore he brings an in-depth eye for a wide variety of different styles and designs from working in these different parts of the country.   
Joshua has been in thousands of bathrooms and can give important design advice for any space. Before he was in the glazing industry, he was a framing carpenter for over 6 years. Being able to visualize the structure behind the finished product allows Joshua to create a better product for you. The structure required for architectural railing glass is paramount to the safety of the people using the product. Joshua can make sure that any project will be safe with consultations at various stages if needed. 

We're social here:
https://www.instagram.com/ashlucreekglass/
https://www.facebook.com/ashlucreekglass
services:
Ashlu Creek Glass Co. is a full service residential glazing company. Our services include but are not limited to:
Frameless Glass Shower Enclosures
Installation of store bought glass shower systems
Mirrors
Vanity
Gym
Decorative Walls
​Custom glass rooms
Frameless office partitions and doors
Frameless gym partitions and doors
Frameless wine rooms
​Kitchen cabinet door glass inserts
Shower door restoration
Cleaning
Re-siliconing
New seals
Glass walls
Frameless Railing Glass - Interior and Exterior
Standoffs
Heavy baseshoe
Spigots
Stainless posts with glass inserts
Glass inserts for wood railings
Frameless water closets (frosted or sandblasted glass)
Glass shelves
Shower glass shelves
Kitchen and bar glass shelves
 ​Back-painted glass backsplashes for kitchens
​Commercial frameless glass​
Office walls
Office doors
Office railings
specialities:
The Ashlu Creek Difference
Ashlu Creek Glass Co. prides itself on customer service. Customer service and satisfaction is the most important part of our business. We enjoy working with everyone in the process of a project, whether it is homeowners, designers, contractors, architects and other trades.
​
Ashlu Creek Glass Co. offers fair pricing. We do not believe in flashy sales tactics, costly addons for everything under the sun, and saying “no”. The pricing for things like showers and mirrors is based on the square foot of the area the glass is going. Every project will vary in price, but you can be sure you are getting a fair price every time. 

Over the past 10 years the Owner, Joshua, has come to love the glass business. It is his passion, and he carries that through every step of each project. Unlike many other companies, Joshua will be there from start to finish. From taking the initial call, estimating, templating, installing and follow up. Being there every step of the way means you will get the best possible product. 


 * Value Added Extras *
​Every shower will come with 2 extra door sweeps. I believe the average frameless shower enclosure should get 10 – 15 years of use. The sweeps often need to be changed out every 3 years or so. Basically, sweeps for the life of the shower. Included is  a squeegee with the same finish as the hardware - Chrome, Brushed, or Matte Black.
Tiered Warranty
1-year comprehensive warranty for parts, labor, and seals (including silicone), it is a 3 year warranty on door sags (sometimes the door will “shift” requiring an adjustment), 5 years on the silicone between glass and tile.
warranty_terms: Yes. Tiered Warranty. Ask for more details.
name: Ashlu Creek Glass Co.
